main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over New York City in March 1962 with various descriptions including bright lights, rapid movement, and unusual shapes.
interesting points: The sightings included erratic movement such as zig-zag patterns at high speeds,One observer described a cigar-shaped object with no lights or sound,Another witness saw an illuminated object that resembled a commercial flight,The duration of the sightings ranged from seconds to 10 minutes, Letters included in the documents indicate a lack of answers from the authorities regarding these sightings.
sighted object: Various, including a cigar-shaped object, circular object, bright lights, and saucer-shaped objects
witness description: Witnesses varied from civilians to those reporting to military authorities, many expressed astonishment and confusion over what they had seen.
